events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for the software developer role.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application.
The initial screening of your developer application was completed and you have moved to the next stage.
Thank you for your prompt reply and confirming availability for the next interview stage.
Your technical interview for the software engineer position has been scheduled with the DevOps team.
The technical interview was completed and the feedback was very positive regarding your software skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture and benefits for the engineer position.
You have successfully completed the HR interview, and the overall impression is very favorable.
An offer for the software engineer role has been proposed to you, including salary and benefits details.
We have received your feedback confirming that the offer terms are acceptable and you are excited to join.
You have formally accepted the offer to join the software engineering team, welcome aboard!
Your onboarding process has started, including setting up your development environment and team introductions.
The hiring process has been successfully closed, and you are now an official member of our software engineering team.
